channel.title: How do I add magics and restrict players from using codes?
channel.description: I want to know [b]how to add magics[/b] and how to [b]restrict players from codes[/b], obviously. Everyone wants magic, and I want to restrict players from codes because I want them to atleast try to work for something, because if youre the owner of the server and people get richer than you just by cheating, its no fun.... Sorry if that sounds a little babyish, but thats how I feel

item.title: How do I add magics and restrict players from using codes?
item.dc:creator: @i7ont_i3link i7ont i3link
item.description:
@i7ont_i3link wrote:

on ur client just hit “ctrl f” and type in “Player rights =”… then hit find

Read full topic
